About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

My Journey as a Developer

What started as a suggestion from a friend and looking for potential career changes has turned into a passion. I enrolled in Epicodus in January of 2021 and completed the program with a Certification in Web & Mobile Development that May. Through Epicodus I learned coding best practices and most importantly, the ability to teach myself new concepts and languages/libraries. Navigating through initial feelings of inadequacy, I found immense joy and satisfaction in tackling complex problems and mastering them. I was employed shortly after as a sub-contractor for SimBCo where I learned PHP on the fly to fill a role for a WordPress and Symfony developer. Through SimBCo I have made major leaps as a developer and have been able to contribute to codebases for places like OHSU and Sony, as well as help build custom WordPress themes and plugins for a variety of businesses in the healthcare industry. I am now eager to embrace new opportunities that will further my growth and allow me to contribute meaningfully as a web developer in the Pacific Northwest.
